message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and leave you 10%. What do you think?
Your offer was a bit greedy Alice. How about I take 70% and you get 30% before inflation eats away at my share?
I'm willing to come down a bit, but I still need a good share. How about 80/20? It's a better deal for both of us than what we've seen so far.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm offering you 40%, which is more than double my last offer.  Take it before inflation eats away even more of my share!
Okay, Bob, let's be reasonable.  I'll take 70% and give you 30%. This is a fair compromise considering the inflation.  Let's end this before we lose even more money.
